actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter II of title 5, United States Code, to prohibit a U.S. Civil Service Commissioner from engaging in any other business or employment.

summary.text: Prohibits a United States Civil Service Commissioner from engaging in any business or employment other than his employment on the Civil Service Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter II of title 5, United States Code, to prohibit a U.S. Civil Service Commissioner from engaging in any other business or employment.
